name: 失落的猫猫 Lost Cat
description:
"Lost Cat" is a free, cute, healing game with a bit of difficulty. There are currently four small levels, and the gameplay varies in each level. The little cat needs to collect enough fish to return home.Subsequent levels include features such as perspective movement, avoiding traps, evading monsters, and time-traveling movement, among others.

Game Features:

Single-player game
Adorable and healing characters and scenes
Collect enough fish to enter the next level
Requires some reflexes and cleverness
Improper operation may lead to many deaths
